towers.name: Chicken Tower
towers.description:
The Chicken is a fully
offensive turret with
its ability to shoot
eggs. Its first upgrade
increases its attack
speed and its second
upgrade increases its
range

towers.name: Cow Tower
towers.description:
The Cow is a jack of all
trades. It releases a
burp cloud that deals
constant damage. Its
first upgrade will allow
its burp cloud to stun
enemies for a second.
Its second upgrade
buffs the attack speed
of non-cow towers
near it.

towers.name: Spider Tower
towers.description:
The Spider is a support
turret with the ability to slow down enemies as well as make enemies more vulnerable to other turrets' damage.

towers.name: Eagle Tower
towers.description:
The Eagle is a hard
hitter but it lacks the
ability to attack fast.
Its first upgrade
increases its damage
and its second upgrade
provides a damage buff
to allies within its
range.

towers.name: Elephant Tower
towers.description:
The Elephant has a
rapid rate of fire but
is slightly innacurate.
You control where they
fire by pressing/holding
X on a desired spot.
Its first upgrade
increases its attack
speed and its second
upgrade increases its
damage.

towers.name: Penguin Tower
towers.description:
The Penguin has both
offense and crowd
control at its disposal.
Its attacks both pack a
punch and slightly slow
enemies. Its first
upgrade increases its
attack speed and its
second upgrade
increases the slow on
its attack.
